item.title: Skupper Network Deployment using Ansible
item.description: I have prepared the following video demonstrating a new approach to set up your Skupper network using Ansible. The example demonstrated in the video, can be found at: https://github.com/skupperproject/skupper-ansible/tree/main/examples/hello-world
